get.summary: Query tasks by expiration date for notification

parameters.name: daysOfDelay
parameters.description: The period you want to search for notifications

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of notification search. If '1', return all tasks from today to the determined period; otherwise, return only tasks for the exact date.

x-middleware-description:
This route applies a rate limiter middleware to control the number of requests allowed in a certain period of time.
It allows a maximum of 5 requests per hour.
This route applies an authentication middleware to control the access to the route.
It allows access only to authenticated user.
